Text:
What a scam... don't bother downloading this book.  Its just a book by Paul Reed telling you that he has discovered the underworld secret of Ninja and if you want to know how to do them, well go to his website and pay $47.77 for the actual book. 

WHAT A SCAM!

It was funny. 
But I'm not gonna cough up 77bucks for more laughs when I can download Beverly hills ninja for free.
